channel.title: PI custom shops
channel.description: Hey all everythings going great with my new server I just had 1 little problem I have custom point shops pkp shops and donator point shops some of the items Im using are in both shops and If I price something that's the price for both shops I really need a separate price so please help me

item.title: PI custom shops
item.dc:creator: @bluedevil666 bluedevil666
item.description:
@bluedevil666 wrote:

:rolleyes: How should I start it out I’ve tried finding tutorials nothing that suits my needs
im not that good with coding this yet

Read full topic

item.title: PI custom shops
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

No ones here to spoon feed you if you want to learn something and feel good code it yourself.

Good luck on this and I’m pretty sure there is tons of tutorials on this.

Read full topic

item.title: PI custom shops
item.dc:creator: @bluedevil666 bluedevil666
item.description:
@bluedevil666 wrote:

Thanks for feedback but can you make me a code for that?

Read full topic

item.title: PI custom shops
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Because you’re using the same method to get the prices.

Make your own method, one for handling the donator points, and the other for handling the pk points.

All handled in ShopAssistant.

Read full topic
